text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem vehicle-condition-cs

This case-sensitive code system https://build.fhir.org/ig/UPM-NTHC/PH-RoadSafetyIG/CodeSystem/vehicle-condition-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
intact IntactVehicle is in good working condition with no visible damage.
minor-damage Minor DamageVehicle has cosmetic or small functional damage but is still operable.
major-damage Major DamageVehicle has significant structural or functional damage, may not be safe to drive.
total-loss Total LossVehicle is beyond economical repair (insurance write-off).
unknown UnknownVehicle condition could not be determined at the time of assessment.

name: VehicleConditionCS
title: Vehicle Condition
publisher: UP Manila - National Institutes of Health - National Telehealth Center

contact.name: UP Manila - National Institutes of Health - National Telehealth Center

concept.definition: Vehicle is in good working condition with no visible damage.
Vehicle has cosmetic or small functional damage but is still operable.
Vehicle has significant structural or functional damage, may not be safe to drive.
Vehicle is beyond economical repair (insurance write-off).
Vehicle condition could not be determined at the time of assessment.
